trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> objects that are managed by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> gerenciados por um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: This class can be extended to develop any type of user interface behavior, including selection, drag, and resize behaviors.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe pode ser estendida para desenvolver qualquer tipo de comportamento de interface do usuário, incluindo a seleção, arraste e redimensione comportamentos.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [visão geral do serviço de comportamento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).

trans-unit.source: Your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> type must be associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> tipo deve ser associado com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> tipo.

trans-unit.source: Glyph-independent behaviors are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Comportamentos de glifo independentes não têm suporte.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create your own class based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> class that responds to user clicks.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar sua própria classe baseada o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> classe responde a cliques do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the parent behavior should be called if it exists; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o comportamento pai deve ser chamado se ele existir; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> class with the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> determinado.

trans-unit.source: The parent behavior is the next behavior on the behavior stack maintained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de pai é o comportamento de Avançar na pilha de comportamento mantida pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: If the `callParentBehavior` parameter is `true`, then the `behaviorService` parameter must not be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o `callParentBehavior` parâmetro é `true`, em seguida, o `behaviorService` parâmetro não deve ser `null`.

trans-unit.source: `callParentBehavior` indicates whether the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> class should call the parent behavior, and then allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> select the correct parent behavior.
trans-unit.target: `callParentBehavior` Indica se a base de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> classe deve chamar o comportamento de pai e, em seguida, permitir que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> selecione o comportamento correto de pai.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callParentBehavior" /> is <see langword="true" />, and <paramref name="behaviorService" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callParentBehavior" /> é <see langword="true" /> e <paramref name="behaviorService" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cursor that should be displayed for this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o cursor que deve ser exibido para este comportamento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> that represents the cursor that should be displayed for this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> que representa o cursor deve ser exibido para esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> objects should be disabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os objetos <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> devem ser desabilitados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> objects the designer receives should have states set to <c>Enabled = false</c> when this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> is active; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se todos os <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" /> recebe o designer de objetos devem ter estados definidos como <c>Enabled = false</c> quando isso <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> estiver ativa; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A `true` value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.DisableAllCommands%2A> property indicates to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> that all <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> objects the designer receives should have their state disabled when this behavior is active.
trans-unit.target: Um `true` valor para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.DisableAllCommands%2A> propriedade indica para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> que todos os <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> recebe o designer de objetos devem ter seu estado desabilitado quando esse comportamento está ativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.DisableAllCommands%2A> property works in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> method so you can customize the interaction between glyphs and behaviors.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.DisableAllCommands%2A> propriedade funciona em conjunto com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> método para que você pode personalizar a interação entre glifos e comportamentos.

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the results of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> for a particular <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir resume os resultados de uma chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> para um determinado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.DisableAllCommands%2A> is `true`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.DisableAllCommands%2A> é `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.DisableAllCommands%2A> is `false`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.DisableAllCommands%2A> é `false`

trans-unit.source: Hit-tested glyph has an assigned behavior
trans-unit.target: Testado acerto de glifo tem um comportamento atribuído

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> with the specified `command ID` is found in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>, that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> is disabled and returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> com especificado `command ID` foi encontrado no <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>, que <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> é desabilitada e retornado.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, `null` será retornado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> is called on the behavior and, if found, the behavior’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> é chamado no comportamento e, se encontrado, o comportamento <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> é retornado.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with the specified `command ID` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o resultado de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com especificado `command ID` é retornado.

trans-unit.source: Hit-tested glyph has no assigned behavior
trans-unit.target: Testado acerto de glifo não tem nenhum comportamento atribuído

trans-unit.source: The result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with the specified `command ID` is returned.
trans-unit.target: O resultado de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com especificado `command ID` é retornado.

trans-unit.source: The result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with the specified `command ID` is returned.
trans-unit.target: O resultado de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com especificado `command ID` é retornado.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />.

trans-unit.source: Intercepts commands.
trans-unit.target: Intercepta comandos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand(System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID)" /> returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand(System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID)" /> retorna <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> method is called from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> método é chamado a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: It provides an opportunity for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> to return its own custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>, thereby intercepting this message.
trans-unit.target: Ele fornece uma oportunidade para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> para retornar o seu próprio personalizado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>e, portanto, interceptando essa mensagem.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> object on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> no qual invocar um comportamento do tipo "arrastar e soltar".

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: Permite um comportamento do tipo "arrastar e soltar" personalizado.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnDragDrop(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" /> method so that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> can specify its own drag-and-drop rules.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnDragDrop(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" /> método para que um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> pode especificar suas próprias regras de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> on which to invoke drag-enter behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> no qual invocar um comportamento do tipo "drag-enter".

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-enter behavior.
trans-unit.target: Permite um comportamento do tipo "drag-enter" personalizado.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnDragEnter(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" /> method so that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> can specify its own drag-enter rules.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnDragEnter(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" /> método para que um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> pode especificar suas próprias regras drag-enter.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> on which to invoke drag-leave behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> no qual invocar um comportamento do tipo "drag-leave".

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-leave behavior.
trans-unit.target: Permite um comportamento do tipo "drag-leave" personalizado.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnDragLeave(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.EventArgs)" /> method so that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> can specify its own drag-leave rules.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnDragLeave(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.EventArgs)" /> método para que um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> pode especificar suas próprias regras deixe de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> on which to invoke drag-over behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> no qual invocar um comportamento do tipo "drag-over".

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-over behavior.
trans-unit.target: Permite um comportamento do tipo "drag-over" personalizado.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnDragOver(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" /> method so that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> can specify its own drag-over rules.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnDragOver(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" /> método para que um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> pode especificar suas próprias regras de failover de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> no qual invocar um comportamento do tipo "arrastar e soltar".

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-and-drop feedback behavior.
trans-unit.target: Permite um comportamento de comentários do tipo "arrastar e soltar" personalizado.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnGiveFeedback(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs)" /> method so that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> can specify its own drag-and-drop rules.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnGiveFeedback(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs)" /> método para que um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> pode especificar suas próprias regras de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> no qual invocar um comportamento do tipo "arrastar e soltar".

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called by the adorner window when it loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pela janela de adorno quando ela perde a captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: A behavior can request mouse capture through the behavior service by pushing itself onto the behavior stack with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um comportamento pode solicitar a captura do mouse por meio do serviço de comportamento por push em si para a pilha de comportamento com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If it does so, it will be notified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A> method when capture is lost.
trans-unit.target: Se ele faz isso, ele será notificado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A> método quando a captura é perdida.

trans-unit.source: Generally the behavior removes itself from the stack at this time.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente o comportamento remove a próprio da pilha no momento.

trans-unit.source: Capture is lost when one of the following actions occurs:
trans-unit.target: Captura é perdida quando uma das seguintes ações ocorrerá:

trans-unit.source: Someone else requests capture.
trans-unit.target: Alguém solicitações de captura.

trans-unit.source: Another behavior is pushed.
trans-unit.target: Outro comportamento é enviada por push.

trans-unit.source: This behavior is removed.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento é removido.

trans-unit.source: In each of these cases, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A> will be called on the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Em cada um desses casos, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A> será chamado no comportamento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> value indicating which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> que indica qual botão foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the click occurred.
trans-unit.target: O local no qual o clique ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Called when any double-click message enters the adorner window of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando qualquer mensagem de clique duplo entra na janela de adorno do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem foi manipulada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any double-click message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> método é chamado quando qualquer mensagem de clique duplo entra o `WndProc` da janela de adorno a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem é passada pela primeira vez aqui, para o principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> na pilha de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Retornando `true` deste método significa que a mensagem foi tratada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> e não deve continuar a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Aqui, a mensagem é enviada para o comportamento apropriado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle a double-click message.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como tratar uma mensagem de clique duplo.

trans-unit.source: For a full code listing, see [How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma listagem de código completo, consulte [como: estender a aparência e comportamento de controles no modo de Design](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68f85054-2253-47f5-a4f2-3f1ac8c9f27b).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> value indicating which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> que indica qual botão foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the click occurred.
trans-unit.target: O local no qual o clique ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-down message enters the adorner window of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando qualquer mensagem de mouse para baixo entra na janela de adorno do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem foi manipulada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-down message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> método é chamado quando qualquer mensagem suspensa mouse entra o `WndProc` da janela de adorno a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem é passada pela primeira vez aqui, para o principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> na pilha de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Retornando `true` deste método significa que a mensagem foi tratada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> e não deve continuar a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Aqui, a mensagem é enviada para o comportamento apropriado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-enter message enters the adorner window of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando qualquer mensagem de entrada do mouse entra na janela de adorno do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem foi manipulada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-enter message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> método é chamado quando nenhuma mensagem mouse-enter entra o `WndProc` da janela de adorno a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Aqui, a mensagem é enviada para o comportamento apropriado.

trans-unit.source: When the mouse pointer's location is positively hit-tested with a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> than previous hit tests, this method is called on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o local do ponteiro do mouse é positivamente ocorrências testados com outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> de testes de ocorrências anteriores, esse método é chamado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the hover occurred.
trans-unit.target: O local no qual a focalização ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-hover message enters the adorner window of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando qualquer mensagem de passagem do mouse entra na janela de adorno do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem foi manipulada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-hover message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> método é chamado quando uma mensagem de foco de mouse entra o `WndProc` da janela de adorno a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem é passada pela primeira vez aqui, para o principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> na pilha de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Retornando `true` deste método significa que a mensagem foi tratada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> e não deve continuar a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Aqui, a mensagem é enviada para o comportamento apropriado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-leave message enters the adorner window of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando qualquer mensagem de saída do mouse entra na janela de adorno do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem foi manipulada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-leave message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> método é chamado quando nenhuma mensagem deixe de mouse entra o `WndProc` da janela de adorno a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Aqui, a mensagem é enviada para o comportamento apropriado.

trans-unit.source: When the mouse pointer leaves a positively hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>, this method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Quando o ponteiro do mouse sai de um positivamente ocorrências testados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> com uma validade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>, esse método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons" /> que indica qual botão foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the move occurred.
trans-unit.target: O local no qual a movimentação ocorreu.

trans-unit.target: Chamado quando qualquer mensagem de movimentação do mouse entra na janela de adorno do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-up message enters the adorner window of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando qualquer mensagem de mouse para cima entra na janela de adorno do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> método é chamado quando nenhuma mensagem o mouse entra o `WndProc` da janela de adorno a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem é passada pela primeira vez aqui, para o principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> na pilha de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Retornando `true` deste método significa que a mensagem foi tratada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> e não deve continuar a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Aqui, a mensagem é enviada para o comportamento apropriado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Sends this drag-and-drop event from the adorner window to the appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> or hit-tested <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Envia este evento do tipo "arrastar e soltar" da janela de adorno para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> apropriado ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> com teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnQueryContinueDrag(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs)" /> method so that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> can specify its own drag-and-drop rules.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnQueryContinueDrag(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph,System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs)" /> método para que um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> pode especificar suas próprias regras de arrastar e soltar.
